page.title: 12CHINESE TAKEAWAY
page.content: Mr.Lee gets up at 11.20am.He brushes his teeth and washes his face.At 12.00 noon he has his dinner,which is usually chicken and chips.Then after his dinner he starts working.First he waters the beansprouts and shells the king prawns. After that he cuts the spare ribs off a pig which takes four hours.After doing those jobs Mr.Lee then has his tea at 4 o'clock.When Mr.Lee fineshes his tea at four twenty,he starts work again.Mr. Lee then washes the frying pan which is 4 timesthe size of a normal frying pan. Then he cleans the oven which is 5 times big as a normal oven.This takes him to 5.20pm.After,Mr.Lee goes home for a nap.After his nap hegoes to the shop again and starts making meals. Later on at 12.30am the shop shuts and is opened again at 6.30pm.Then at 3.00am he shuts the shop and goes home counts money,then to bed at 5.30 am.
